original_text: The rules that they give you are difficult to obey. Their rules are like heavy luggage, which they make you carry. But they themselves will not help you to carry that luggage. They will not agree to use even one finger to help you.
korean_text: 또 무거운 짐을 묶어 사람의 어깨에 지우되 자기는 이것을 한 손가락으로도 움직이려 하지 아니하며

sentences.original_text: The rules that they give you
Their rules are like heavy luggage,
will not help you to carry that luggage.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 짐을 지는 것을 너희를 도와주지 않을 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: They will not agree to use even one finger
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 한 손가락이라도 사용하기를 동의하지 않을 것입니다.
